metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14459 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
nfdump 1.6.17 and earlier is affected by an integer overflow in the function Process_ipfix_template_withdraw in ipfix.c that can be abused in order to crash the process remotely (denial of service).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14459` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nfdump - 1.6.18-1
nfdump-sflow - 1.6.18-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nfdump package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.18-1').
